SEARCH
Package Distributed.rmi

Class ServerImpl

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
Distributed.rmi.ServerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ServerRMIInterface, Serializable, Remote, GameEventListener
public class ServerImpl extends UnicastRemoteObject implements ServerRMIInterface, GameEventListener
Class that represents a server that interacts with a remote client using RMI (Remote Method Invocation).
See Also:

      RemoteException - If there are problems with the RMI connection.

  • Method Details

    • register

      public void register(ClientRMIInterface client) throws IOException, SameNicknameException, NotEnoughSpaceChoiceException, NotAdjacentSlotsException, NotCatchableException, org.json.simple.parser.ParseException
      Remote method used by the client in order to registry itself to the server and, in this way, to the model.
      Specified by:
      register in interface ServerRMIInterface
      Parameters:
      client - The client that wants to registry itself.
      Throws:
      IOException - Exception thrown if an input or an output failed.
      SameNicknameException - Exception thrown if the client tries to registry with an already used nickname
      NotCatchableException - Exception thrown if the tiles selected by the player are not catchable.
      NotAdjacentSlotsException - Exception thrown if the tiles selected by the player are not nearby.
      NotEnoughSpaceChoiceException - Exception thrown if there is not enough space to insert all the selected tiles.
      org.json.simple.parser.ParseException - Exception thrown if there are parsing problems during the reading of the personal goals from their json file.

    • updateServerSelection

      public void updateServerSelection(ClientRMIInterface client, SlotChoice[] SC) throws RemoteException, NotAdjacentSlotsException, NotCatchableException
      Remote method used by the client when the user choose some coordinates.
      Specified by:
      updateServerSelection in interface ServerRMIInterface
      Parameters:
      client - The client that choose the tiles.
      SC - Array that contains the coordinates of the tiles selected by the client.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - Exception thrown if there are problems with the client-server connection.
      NotCatchableException - Exception thrown if the tiles selected by the player are not catchable.
      NotAdjacentSlotsException - Exception thrown if the tiles selected by the player are not nearby.

    • updateServerReorder

      public void updateServerReorder(ClientRMIInterface client, OrderChoice C) throws RemoteException
      Remote method used by the client when a user has chosen if order the tiles.
      Specified by:
      updateServerReorder in interface ServerRMIInterface
      Parameters:
      client - Client that has chosen if reorder the tiles.
      C - Array that contains the order chosen by the user for the tiles.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - Exception thrown if there are problems with the client-server connection.

    • updateServerInsert

      public void updateServerInsert(ClientRMIInterface client, int column) throws RemoteException, NotEnoughSpaceChoiceException, NotAdjacentSlotsException, NotCatchableException
      Remote method used by the client when a user has chosen the column where he decided to insert the tiles.
      Specified by:
      updateServerInsert in interface ServerRMIInterface
      Parameters:
      client - Client that has chosen the column.
      column - Column where the client wants to insert the tiles.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - Exception thrown if there are problems with the client-server connection.
      NotCatchableException - Exception thrown if the tiles selected by the player are not catchable.
      NotAdjacentSlotsException - Exception thrown if the tiles selected by the player are not nearby.
      NotEnoughSpaceChoiceException - Exception thrown if there is not enough space to insert all the selected tiles.

    • updateServerChoices

      public void updateServerChoices(ClientRMIInterface client, int number) throws RemoteException, NotEnoughSpaceChoiceException, NotAdjacentSlotsException, NotCatchableException
      Remote method used by the client to update the server about the number of choices that the user wants to do in the turn.
      Specified by:
      updateServerChoices in interface ServerRMIInterface
      Parameters:
      client - Client that wants to update.
      number - The number of choices that the user wants to do.

      NotAdjacentSlotsException - Exception thrown if the tiles selected by the player are not nearby.
      NotEnoughSpaceChoiceException - Exception thrown if there is not enough space to insert all the selected tiles.

    • notifyForcedTurnEnding

      public void notifyForcedTurnEnding() throws NotEnoughSpaceChoiceException, RemoteException
      Method that force the end of the turn if there is a crash during it.
      Specified by:
      notifyForcedTurnEnding in interface GameEventListener
      Throws:
      NotEnoughSpaceChoiceException - Exception thrown if there is not enough space to insert all the selected tiles.
      RemoteException - Exception thrown if there are problems with the client-server connection.

    • newTurn

      public void newTurn() throws RemoteException, NotEnoughSpaceChoiceException, NotAdjacentSlotsException, NotCatchableException
      Method that notifies the clients in game the new turn and permits to play to the user that is on turn. When there is a new turn, it verifies if all the clients enrolled to the game are not crashed.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - Exception thrown if there are problems with the client-server connection.
      NotCatchableException - Exception thrown if the tiles selected by the player are not catchable.
      NotAdjacentSlotsException - Exception thrown if the tiles selected by the player are not nearby.
      NotEnoughSpaceChoiceException - Exception thrown if there is not enough space to insert all the selected tiles.

    • resumeGame

      public void resumeGame() throws RemoteException, NotEnoughSpaceChoiceException, NotAdjacentSlotsException, NotCatchableException
      Method that resume the game flow if, after that was remained only one player, someone of the one crashed before return in game.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - Exception thrown if there are problems with the client-server connection.
      NotCatchableException - Exception thrown if the tiles selected by the player are not catchable.
      NotAdjacentSlotsException - Exception thrown if the tiles selected by the player are not nearby.
      NotEnoughSpaceChoiceException - Exception thrown if there is not enough space to insert all the selected tiles.

      RemoteException - Exception thrown if there are problems with the client-server connection.
